codeGet:
select * from (
select GBRCSEC_DEVELOPER_USER_ID as "USER", GBRCSEC_ALLOW_MODIFY_IND AS "ALLOW_MODIFY", GBRCSEC_TYPE as "USER_TYPE", 'C' AS "SOURCE_TYPE" , GBRCSEC_CSS_ID as "ID", GBRCSEC_SURROGATE_ID as "SURR_ID" FROM GBRCSEC
union
select GBRPSEC_DEVELOPER_USER_ID as "USER", GBRPSEC_ALLOW_MODIFY_IND AS "ALLOW_MODIFY", GBRPSEC_TYPE as "USER_TYPE", 'P' AS "SOURCE_TYPE", GBRPSEC_PAGE_ID as "ID", GBRPSEC_SURROGATE_ID as "SURR_ID"  FROM GBRPSEC
union
select GBRVSEC_DEVELOPER_USER_ID as "USER", GBRVSEC_ALLOW_MODIFY_IND AS "ALLOW_MODIFY", GBRVSEC_TYPE as "USER_TYPE", 'V' AS "SOURCE_TYPE", GBRVSEC_DOMAIN_ID as "ID", GBRVSEC_SURROGATE_ID as "SURR_ID" FROM GBRVSEC) 
WHERE 
SOURCE_TYPE = :type and ID= :id and USER_TYPE =:usertype
